articles.author: Guardian sport
articles.title: ‘I’ve never felt this pain’: Andreescu leaves court in wheelchair at Miami Open - The Guardian
articles.description: 2019 US Open champion Bianca Andreescu left the court in a wheelchair in the second set of her Miami Open match against Ekaterina Alexandrova on Monday
articles.content:
2019 US Open champion Bianca Andreescu left the court in a wheelchair due to a leg injury in the second set of her Miami Open match against Ekaterina Alexandrova on Monday night.
Andreescu was trail… [+1405 chars]
